subject: Tracking Number: SF6047111321054
description_text:
Dear Customer,

Greetings!

I am a customer service representative from SF International E-commerce. This email is to inform your company about the status of a relevant package. Specifically:

We look forward to your reply and wish you a pleasant day!

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact QQ 800013683 or email iecomcs@sf-express.com. Thank you!
